483790.name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Tatsuya Epilogue
483790.description:
Note: This is the epilogue to Tatsuya's Main Story. For the best playthrough experience, we recommend having finished all three of Tatsuya's canon endings from his main story.

Fast forward two years to the future and see how life has changed for you and Tatsuya. While you've never been more in love, you're not quite as far along in the relationship as you'd hoped. After a romantic date though, your life changes forever.

Can an old threat bring promises of a new, brighter future?

Features

  • Three new chapters
  • A new outfit for Tatsuya
  • A new CG
  • A new achievement

How to Play

After purchasing the DLC, please go to Select a Story > Click on Tatsuya > Click on Epilogue in the top navigation menu.
